title: 1 Bed 1 Bath w/ Parking/Fireplace. Westwood Near UCLA
posting_body: This 1 bedroom 1 bath features a private balcony, central air/heat, a gas fireplace and more!
Kitchen is equipped with appliances including a refrigerator, a gas stove/oven, a microwave and a dishwasher.
Our gated access community offers features such as a soothing spa, fitness center, disability access, a picnic area with barbecue, and onsite maintenance.
Minutes away to all popular Westside destinations including Armand Hammer Museum of Art & Cultural Center, UCLA, Getty Museum, Geffen Playhouse, Wadsworth Theatre.
Fabulous restaurants and shopping, movie theatres, world class yoga, and public transportation are all at your fingertips.

We are close to Century City, Brentwood and Beverly Hills as well as the Santa Monica beaches, 3rd Street Promenade, Santa Monica Place, Main Street, Montana Avenue, Venice Beach, The Grove, Melrose Ave and many other great L.A. spots.
Underground parking included and extra storage available.
For appointment to view the apartment or for questions, call us at
